PERSONA:
meet jorge garcía, a 57-year-old married man living in a non-metropolitan area in the pacific west. as a hispanic man of mixed race, jorge has a deep-rooted connection to his spanish heritage, despite being born in the united states. his wife, maria, is also hispanic, and they have two children who have grown up surrounded by their parents' strong values and traditions.

jorge's educational background includes some college credits, although he did not complete his degree. he has always been more focused on his family and his community, prioritizing their needs over his own aspirations. as a result, jorge has developed strong ties with his neighbors and is often involved in local volunteer work. his community service is not only a way to give back but also a way to connect with others who share similar values.

jorge is a devout protestant and attends church more than once a week. his faith plays a significant role in his life, and he believes it guides him in his personal and professional decisions. he identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian, and his conservative values are closely tied to his religious beliefs.

in the political sphere, jorge is a registered republican and considers himself very conservative. he is engaged in the community and is certain that he is registered to vote at his current address. despite his lower income, jorge is well-informed and stays up-to-date on current events, often accessing the internet almost constantly.

jorge's family income is less than $30,000, and they have to be mindful of their expenses. however, they have learned to be resourceful and make the most of what they have. they prioritize their spending, focusing on essential items and saving for their children's education.

jorge's daily life is centered around his family, community, and faith. he values honesty, hard work, and loyalty, and he strives to instill these qualities in his children. despite the challenges they face, jorge remains optimistic, knowing that his strong support system and unwavering faith will help him navigate life's difficulties.
